author: newsr.in
title: Latest Upatre Trojan Version Targets Windows XP Users
text: Windows XP is officially dead and buried, at least from Microsoft's standpoint, but there still are millions of users who keep using it in the wild, and that's the main reason why cyber-criminals are targeting these systems. With no support and no security fixes arriving on the operating system, XP is a graveyard of old technology, a ghost town in which malware can walk around without fearing the sheriff. AppRiver, a company that provides cyber-security solutions for ema... Â»
